programme.title: (BST) The Ant Bully (2006)
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.

programme.title: The Land Before Time
programme.desc: A young brontosaurus is left alone when his mother dies, so goes off in search of a legendary valley, where food is plentiful and he will be safe. He acquires a group of new friends on his journey, who help each other to avoid predators and obstacles in their way. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gabriel Damon and Pat Hingle.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson.

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader swings into action to save Gotham City from the Joker. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes and Zach Galifianakis.

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: A video game villain grows tired of always being the bad guy, and ventures into other games in search of the chance to be a hero, unwittingly causing chaos in the process. When a deadly threat to the entire arcade appears, it falls to him to set things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of John C Reilly, Sarah Silverman and Jane Lynch.

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson.

programme.desc: The Caped Crusader swings into action to save Gotham City from the Joker. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes and Zach Galifianakis.

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy.(n)

programme.title: Throne of Elves
programme.desc: In the mythical realm of Altera, young hero Lambert is drawn into a bitter conflict between elf princess Liya and her malevolent rival, Elena. Epic animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Ashley Boettcher and GK Bowes.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A pair of fuzzy-headed trolls embark on a daring rescue mission when members of their tribe are kidnapped. Animation, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake.(n)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.desc: Dismissed from the Anti-Villain League after botching a mission, Gru sets off to meet his long-lost twin brother. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker.(n)

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.(n)

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Unfortunately, his task is hindered by the ingenuity of Mardukas and the attentions of pursuing FBI agents and Mafia hitmen. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctor's deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avenger's trap. Ridley Scott's thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Come And Find Me
programme.desc: A man's desperate search for his missing girlfriend takes him down an increasingly dark and dangerous path. Mystery thriller, starring Aaron Paul, Annabelle Wallis and Garret Dillahunt.

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.

programme.title: The Last Castle
programme.desc: A distinguished lieutenant general suffers the indignity of a court martial and ends up behind bars in a high-security military jail, where the chief warden keeps order with an iron fist. Outraged by the guards' behaviour, the fallen hero sets out to expose the violations with the help of his fellow prisoners. Thriller, starring Robert Redford, James Gandolfini, Delroy Lindo, Mark Ruffalo and Clifton Collins Jr.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: Harvard law graduate Mitch is headhunted to work for a prestigious law firm, despite his wife's warnings that it is too good to be true. After two of his colleagues are murdered, Mitch is approached by the FBI and informed the company is controlled by the Mafia - leaving him in a deadly predicament. Thriller, adapted from the novel by John Grisham, starring Tom Cruise, Gene Hackman, Jeanne Tripplehorn and Holly Hunter.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Two marines based in Cuba stand accused of murdering a comrade-in-arms. Three Navy lawyers working on their defence unearth evidence that the soldiers may have been acting under orders, which points to a trail of corruption leading all the way to a top-ranking officer. Drama based on Aaron Sorkin's stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: City of Tiny Lights
programme.desc: A hard-drinking private detective searches for a missing sex worker, leading to a dangerous world of religious fanaticism and political intrigue. London-set crime thriller from Dredd director Pete Travis, starring Riz Ahmed, Billie Piper and James Floyd.

programme.title: United 93
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, recreating the events on the fourth plane hijacked in the September 11 attacks in 2001. The passengers were by now aware of the destruction at the World Trade Centre and the Pentagon. Realising their plane was about to be used for a similar purpose, they set out to wrest control from the terrorists. Directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Christian Clemenson, Trish Gates, David Alan Basche and Cheyenne Jackson.

programme.title: (BST) In the Line of Fire (1993)
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agent's nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersen's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: The Ox-Bow Incident
programme.desc: Cowboys intervene in a bid to prevent the lynching of three men accused of murdering a rancher and stealing his cattle. Western drama, starring Henry Fonda, Henry Morgan and Anthony Quinn.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside.

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A single mother is determined to keep her daughter safe from harm when burglars break into their home. The pair hide out in a specially constructed sealed room, but the shelter becomes a prison when the robbers refuse to leave empty-handed. Thriller directed by David Fincher, starring Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Jared Leto and Dwight Yoakam.

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: A federal marshal sets out in pursuit of an escaped prisoner who is determined to prove his murder conviction was false. As the chase progresses, the marshal is forced to work with a diplomatic security agent, making him realise the fugitive is no ordinary convict and that his claims of innocence may be true. Thriller sequel, starring Tommy Lee Jones reprising his Oscar-winning role from The Fugitive, alongside Wesley Snipes and Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.

programme.title: RoboCop 2
programme.desc: The cybernetic law enforcer returns to battle a deranged drug lord. Meanwhile, he is unaware the corporation that created him has scheduled his replacement by a more powerful version. To complete the new cyborg, they need a human brain, and a renegade scientist secretly implants the injured drug lord's brain into the robot, transforming it into an uncontrollable killing machine. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Tom Noonan and Belinda Bauer.(n)

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: A man is forced to deliver a mysterious package across London for criminals who are holding his girlfriend hostage. Action thriller, starring Josh Bowman, Neil Maskell and William Houston.(n)

programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama following the last years of John Dillinger, whose run of bank robberies and daring prison escapes in the 1930s make him both America's most wanted criminal and a hero to a public struggling through the Depression. His career is soon to be cut short by the birth of the FBI, which assigns its most celebrated agent to bring him to justice. Directed by Michael Mann and starring Johnny Depp, Christian Bale and Marion Cotillard.(n)

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ruthless stockbroker Gordon Gekko is released from prison after eight years, reinventing himself as an author and lecturer warning against the dangers of the financial system. Gekko helps a young banker get revenge on the company that drove his mentor to suicide, but as always, has a crooked agenda of his own. Oliver Stone's sequel to his 1980s drama, with Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan.(n)

programme.title: Freehold
programme.desc: Fast-talking estate agent Hussein finds his personal and professional life unravelling as a wronged former client takes his revenge. Comedy horror, starring Javier Botet, Mandeep Dhillon and Mim Shaikh.(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: Roxxy
programme.desc: Romance blooms between a small-town loner and a rebellious punk rocker, but can the pair escape their troubled pasts? Drama, starring Emile Hirsch, Zoe Kravitz and Zoey Deutch.(n)

programme.title: Two Down
programme.desc: A web of deceit unfolds and an unlikely alliance is formed when a young woman and a local delivery boy are taken hostage by an injured hitman. Comedy thriller, starring Conleth Hill, Alex Hassell and Tori Butler Hart.(n)

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A CIA agent stationed in South Africa is sent to question a rogue operative, who has been arrested years after betraying the agency, only to be attacked by mercenaries hired to capture the fugitive. As they flee for their lives, the interrogator has to contend with not only the enemies hunting them, but also the mind games of his prisoner. Thriller, with Denzel Washington and Ryan Reynolds.(n)

programme.title: The Accountant

programme.title: Damien: Omen II
programme.desc: Teenage Damien is adopted by his rich uncle and aunt, who are unaware of his true origins, and packed off to military academy. But as he becomes aware of his demonic destiny as the Antichrist, another series of grisly murders begins. Horror sequel, starring Jonathan Scott-Taylor, William Holden, Lee Grant, Robert Foxworth, Lew Ayres, Sylvia Sidney and Lance Henriksen.

programme.title: Omen III: The Final Conflict
programme.desc: Antichrist Damien Thorn becomes US Ambassador to Britain, and while engineering dominion over the entire world, he ensures all babies born on a certain day are slaughtered, in the certainty that one of them is the second coming of Christ. Supernatural horror, starring Sam Neill, Rossano Brazzi and Don Gordon.

programme.title: Black Panther: Special
programme.desc: A special preview of forthcoming superhero adventure Black Panther, which sees the titular king of the fictional state of Wakanda take centre stage in Marvel's cinematic universe.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick Robin discover that four of their worst enemies are now working together. The villains plan to use a machine that turns people into dust at a gathering of world leaders, allowing them to seize power. Comedy adventure based on the TV series, starring Adam West, Burt Ward, Burgess Meredith and Frank Gorshin.

programme.title: Red Sparrow: Special
programme.desc: A look at the new espionage thriller Red Sparrow, starring Jennifer Lawrence as a former ballerina recruited into the Russian secret intelligence service.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Undead warrior Selene fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. Action-horror, starring Kate Beckinsale, Theo James and Charles Dance.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husband's murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After an African American photographer and his white girlfriend visit her wealthy parents, he suspects there's more to the locals than meets the eye. Psychological thriller, starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder.

programme.title: Red Sparrow: Special
programme.desc: A look at the new espionage thriller Red Sparrow, starring Jennifer Lawrence as a former ballerina recruited into the Russian secret intelligence service.

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: A gang of interplanetary smugglers is pursued by a government assassin searching for a teenage girl who has taken shelter on board their spaceship. Gifted with extraordinary telepathic powers, she has uncovered a secret that threatens the political stability of the universe - and the ruling forces will stop at nothing to ensure it stays buried. Sci-fi adventure based on the TV series Firefly, starring Nathan Fillion, Summer Glau and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: A skilled fighter clashes with the forces of evil in an attempt to become king of the Britons. Guy Ritchie's fantasy drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Astrid Berges-Frisbey and Djimon Hounsou.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan.

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: A gang of interplanetary smugglers is pursued by a government assassin searching for a teenage girl who has taken shelter on board their spaceship. Gifted with extraordinary telepathic powers, she has uncovered a secret that threatens the political stability of the universe - and the ruling forces will stop at nothing to ensure it stays buried. Sci-fi adventure based on the TV series Firefly, starring Nathan Fillion, Summer Glau and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.(n)

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: A pair of outlaw brothers hunting for the men that killed their father take refuge in a desolate town, but soon discover that they're not alone. Post-apocalyptic horror, starring Aria Emory, Drew Harwood, Monique Rosario.(n)

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara.(n)

programme.title: Cocoon
programme.desc: The elderly residents of a retirement home treat themselves to an occasional dip in the pool at an abandoned house. It turns out that friendly aliens in human form are using the place to restore dormant members of their species - and energy from their cocoons is giving the old-timers a new lease of life. Ron Howard's sci-fi drama, with Wilford Brimley, Jessica Tandy, Hume Cronyn, Don Ameche and Steve Guttenberg.(n)

programme.title: Cocoon: The Return
programme.desc: Three elderly couples return to Earth five years after leaving to retire on a distant planet, surprising their families, who assumed they were dead. Several of their alien friends have come back with them to recover members of their own race left behind in cocoons on the ocean floor, one of whom has been abducted by a government research institute. Sci-fi sequel, with Wilford Brimley, Don Ameche, Steve Guttenberg and Jessica Tandy.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Fantasy adventure, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In the sequel to Batman Begins, the masked hero finds a new ally in his war on organised crime in Gotham's crusading new district attorney, Harvey Dent. However, both men are pushed to their limits by the rise of the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos and destruction throughout the city for his own amusement. Comic-book thriller, starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and an Oscar-winning Heath Ledger.(n)

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley.(n)

M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley.(n)

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A poor teenager leaves home and hits the road with a crew of magazine sellers. She gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love while crossing the Midwest Inuted States. Drama, starring Sasha Lane, Shia LaBeouf and Riley Keough.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.

programme.title: The X Files: I Want to Believe
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Mulder and Scully return to the FBI after years in hiding to assist in the search for several missing women. The investigation leads them to a former priest, who claims to have psychic visions of the victims, and a long-forgotten case involving sinister experiments. Second movie based on the sci-fi series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson and Billy Connolly.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken.

programme.desc: An executive is sent to retrieve his company's chief executive officer from a mysterious `wellness centre' in the Swiss Alps, but suspects the spa's treatments are not what they seem. Psychological thriller, starring Dane DeHaan, Mia Goth and Jason Isaacs.

programme.title: (BST) The Shallows (2016)
programme.desc: Medical student Nancy Adams' plan to honour her late mother puts her face to face with a massive, man-eating shark. Survival horror, starring Blake Lively and Oscar Jaenada.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes battle more bad guys when Shredder breaks out of custody and teams up with the villainous Krang. Action comedy sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Laura Linney.

programme.title: Monster Family: Special
programme.desc: Take a special look at Sky Cinema original film Monster Family, a spooky animated adventure featuring the voices of Emily Watson, Nick Frost and Jason Isaacs.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the near future, Wolverine cares for an ailing Professor X somewhere on the Mexican border. However, the razor-clawed hero's attempts to hide from the world are turned upside down when a young mutant arrives, pursued by lethal forces. Fantasy adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen and Stephen Merchant.

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: Spooky couple Gomez and Morticia hire a nanny to look after their new baby son - and stop him suffering an early death at the hands of his jealous elder siblings. Romance soon blossoms between the new childminder and Uncle Fester, but he does not realise she is planning to kill him once she has got hold of the family fortune. Comedy sequel, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes battle more bad guys when Shredder breaks out of custody and teams up with the villainous Krang. Action comedy sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Laura Linney.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge

programme.title: T2: Trainspotting
programme.desc: After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie. Danny Boyle's sequel to the 1996 drama, starring Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner and Jonny Lee Miller.

programme.title: Drone
programme.desc: A drone pilot who's spent his career conducting covert operations from the comfort of his own home is finally forced to confront his actions. Thriller, starring Sean Bean, Patrick Sabongui and Mary McCormack.(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A successful investment banker is left devastated by the death of his wife. A complaint to a vending machine company sets him off on a letter-writing campaign in which he makes a series of brutally honest personal admissions, providing him with the chance to make a fresh start in his life - as soon as he has finished destroying everything that used to matter to him. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Naomi Watts and Chris Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: Spooky couple Gomez and Morticia hire a nanny to look after their new baby son - and stop him suffering an early death at the hands of his jealous elder siblings. Romance soon blossoms between the new childminder and Uncle Fester, but he does not realise she is planning to kill him once she has got hold of the family fortune. Comedy sequel, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A bail enforcement agent is assigned the task of tracking down his own ex-wife, a wily reporter chasing a story about a murder cover-up. However, bringing his former spouse to justice is harder than he anticipated, not least because she has also been targeted by the criminal she is investigating. Action comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Jennifer Aniston, Gio Perez, Joel Garland, Jason Kolotouros and Matt Malloy.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: An assassination attempt is made on the life of the US president during a terrorism summit. The story unfolds from several perspectives, including that of the secret service agents charged with protecting the head of state, a news producer covering the event and a man in the crowd who may have caught the perpetrator on camera. Thriller, starring Dennis Quaid, Matthew Fox, Forest Whitaker, Sigourney Weaver and William Hurt.(n)

programme.title: Nymphomaniac: Volume I
programme.desc: A woman is found beaten in an alley by a stranger, who brings her home. She spends the night with him, and recounts the story of her sexual history and the darker experiences her search for satisfaction has led to. Part one of Lars von Trier's two-part drama, starring Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgard and Stacy Martin.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: The lost princess from the executed Russian royal family returns to her St Petersburg home with no memory of her heritage. As she tries to retrace her hidden past, two conmen use her in a cunning money-making scheme, little realising the momentous events their duplicity is about to set in motion. Animated adventure, with the voices of Meg Ryan, John Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Flight of the Navigator
programme.desc: A boy mysteriously disappears in 1978, and is found eight years later, having not aged a day. He escapes being experimented on by government scientists by taking off in a crashed alien spaceship. With the help of the robot pilot, he tries to find out what has happened to him and if he can get back home. Sci-fi adventure, starring Joey Cramer and Veronica Cartwright, with the voice of Paul Reubens.

programme.title: The Indian in the Cupboard
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy is given an old cupboard and a toy Iroquois Indian for his birthday - but when he puts the figure inside the cupboard, he is astonished to see it come to life. He repeats the experiment with more of his toys, and realises he is creating real people - and is responsible for their wellbeing. Children's fantasy, with Hal Scardino, Litefoot and Steve Coogan.

programme.title: Carry On Cabby
programme.desc: The neglected wife of a workaholic taxi owner grows increasingly tired of his lack of interest in their marriage. In a ploy to bring him to his senses, she secretly launches a rival cab firm with a driver roster made up of attractive women, who soon tempt his customers away. Comedy, starring Sid James, Hattie Jacques, Kenneth Connor and Charles Hawtrey.

programme.title: Mrs Doubtfire
programme.desc: A struggling actor's ambitious, no-nonsense wife throws him out and demands a divorce. Desperate to spend time with his children, he puts his talents to good use by donning drag and posing as a Scottish housekeeper to get a job looking after them. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Sally Field, Pierce Brosnan, Harvey Fierstein and Mara Wilson.

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin.

programme.title: Nymphomaniac: Volume II
programme.desc: A woman continues telling the man who saved her life the unusual story of her sexual history, which now turns to the more recent events of her life and the disturbing incidents that ultimately led to her brush with death. Concluding part of Lars von Trier's drama, starring Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgard and Stacy Martin.

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Jess befriends a new girl at school, and the pair begin to create their own imaginary kingdom in a secret place in the woods to escape the difficulties of their real lives. Unfortunately, a tragedy threatens to bring their fantasy world to an end. Drama based on Katherine Paterson's novel, starring Josh Hutcherson, AnnaSophia Robb, Zooey Deschanel and Robert Patrick.

programme.title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: A girl grows up in 16th-century Europe under the iron fist of her stepmother, until the love of handsome Prince Henry offers a glimmer of hope. Unfortunately, the royal gent has worries of his own in the shape of an arranged marriage. Luckily, Renaissance genius Leonardo da Vinci is on hand to play fairy godfather and bring the pair together. Romantic drama, starring Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott and Timothy West.

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: An orphan lives in the walls of a 1930s railway station, hiding from the inspector who would send him to an orphanage. He scours the station for parts to complete a clockwork robot belonging to his father, a quest which leads him to uncover a lonely shopkeeper's mysterious past. Martin Scorsese's family adventure, starring Asa Butterfield, Chloe Grace Moretz and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen's victory in a televised death match makes her a focus for revolution against the totalitarian nation she lives in. The rulers of the regime plot to crush dissent with a new series of games, in which past champions battle it out. Sci-fi adventure sequel based on the second book in Suzanne Collins' trilogy of novels, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Liam Hemsworth, Donald Sutherland and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A repairman is assigned to salvage the remaining resources from Earth, which has been left a devastated wasteland after a war with an alien race. He discovers a human survivor on the surface of the planet, an encounter that exposes secrets from the past that threaten the future of the human race. Sci-fi adventure, starring Tom Cruise and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Child 44
programme.desc: A secret police agent in 1950s Russia is disgraced for refusing to denounce his own wife as a traitor. Reassigned to a remote outpost, he tries to bring a serial child murderer to justice, but faces an official cover-up by a rival, who wants to maintain the illusion that Soviet society is without crime. Detective thriller based on Tom Rob Smith's novel, starring Tom Hardy, Gary Oldman and Noomi Rapace.

programme.title: Submarine
programme.desc: A 15-year-old boy determined to lose his virginity before he turns 16 becomes infatuated with a feisty classmate. He also has a more pressing mission to undertake as he tries to save his parents' failing marriage, despite his father's apathy and the return of his mother's smooth-talking ex. Comedy drama, with Craig Roberts, Sally Hawkins, Paddy Considine and Noah Taylor.(n)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: Sitcom. Ex-students, Alfonso and Ryan, can't seem to move on. Change is imposed on their safe world - maybe that isn't so bad? (SL).(n)

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond. Includes RTE News and weather.(n)

programme.title: The Undefeated
programme.desc: A veteran Union officer crosses paths again with a former Confederate enemy years after the end of the Civil War - and their past animosity resurfaces. However, when a Mexican general takes the ex-Confederate and his men hostage, the old Union soldier debates whether to surrender his herd of horses by way of ransom. Western, with John Wayne, Rock Hudson, Lee Meriwether, Tony Aguilar and Roman Gabriel.(n)

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Oil prospectors travel to a recently discovered and remote Pacific island, where they encounter a gigantic gorilla. The men manage to capture the huge ape and bring it back to America - but the confused creature is terrified by events and escapes, wreaking havoc in New York. Remake of the classic 1933 fantasy adventure, with Jeff Bridges, Jessica Lange and Charles Grodin.(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: A teenager falls in love with a new girl in his school, only to discover she is a witch. As dark secrets from her family's past emerge, they discover that on her 16th birthday, she will be required to choose a side in a conflict between good and evil. Fantasy based on Kami Garcia's novel, starring Alden Ehrenreich, Alice Englert, Jeremy Irons and Emma Thompson.(n)

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: With the original Best Exotic Marigold Hotel a roaring success, owner Sonny decides the time is right to expand his business empire. But to do so, he and the rest of the residents must pull out all the stops to impress a potential investor's inspector - a task that proves to be easier said than done. Comedy drama sequel, with Dev Patel, Maggie Smith, Judi Dench and Richard Gere.(n)

programme.title: Man on a Ledge
programme.desc: An escaped convict climbs onto the outside of a skyscraper and threatens to jump. The police psychologist sent to talk him down begins to suspect there is an agenda behind this suspicious-seeming suicide bid, while the prisoner's brother takes advantage of the ensuing chaos to carry out a plan of his own. Thriller, with Sam Worthington, Jamie Bell, Elizabeth Banks and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A travelling salesman convinces the family to part with their hard-earned cash and buy a small library's worth of novels, essays and poems. But when the books fail to arrive, they soon begin to wonder if he is really a conman.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy agrees to work for a local man in exchange for a car, but ends up being taken for a ride when the scoundrel reneges on the deal.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: An old man takes in two orphans running from care workers who have decided they stand a better chance of finding a family if they are split up and offered for adoption separately.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Annie Crane's mother finally tracks her daughter down and sparks begin to fly, until Caroline intervenes.

programme.title: Providence
programme.sub-title: All Good Dogs Go to Heaven
programme.desc: Jim cares for a dying dog that is pining for its owner, Joanie meets a celebrity and Syd attempts to save a teenage girl's life.

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob worries about how different he looks from his brothers and sisters, and begins to wonder if John and Olivia really are his parents.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben starts to hunt animals for their skins to sell for profit. John-Boy organises a reenactment of a famous historical battle, leaving Grandpa ashamed, as he has exaggerated his own part in the actual event.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy takes in a runaway child fleeing from her abusive stepfather. However, Grandpa is suspicious of her story.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia gets a job working for a dressmaker, but as her responsibilities grow, she starts to miss leading a simple life.

programme.title: Montana Sky
programme.desc: Three women with the same father but different mothers meet for the first time after their estranged father dies. They discover he has left them his ranch in his will - on the condition that they run the estate together for at least a year. Unfortunately, they soon learn the old man had enemies determined to make sure they fail. Drama, starring Ashley Williams, Charlotte Ross and Laura Mennell.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Now and Forever
programme.desc: A couple's seemingly perfect marriage is destroyed when the husband is accused of rape by another woman. Drama based on the novel by Danielle Steele, starring Cheryl Ladd and Robert Coleby, with Christine Amor.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Zoya
programme.desc: Part one of two. A Russian aristocrat is forced by the Revolution into a life of poverty-stricken exile in Paris, where she falls for a handsome American soldier. The couple move to New York and seem set for a life of happiness - until the Wall Street Crash deals another devastating blow. Melodrama, based on Danielle Steel's novel, starring Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and Diana Rigg.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Zoya
programme.desc: The Wall Street Crash deals another devastating blow to exiled Russian aristocrat Zoya as she moves to New York with the handsome American soldier she met in Paris. Concluding part of the melodrama based on Danielle Steel's novel, starring Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and Diana Rigg.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Mixed Blessings
programme.desc: Three couples contemplating parenthood each encounter difficulties. Andy and Diana struggle to conceive, forcing them to consider other options, Charlie wants to be a father but his wife Beth is unconvinced, while Brad and his younger spouse Pilar have a difficult relationship with his daughter from a previous marriage. Drama, starring Bruce Greenwood and Gabrielle Carteris.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Secrets
programme.desc: The cast of a glossy American TV series' steamy on-screen relationships pale in comparison with their behind-the-scenes antics. Drama, starring Stephanie Beacham, Christopher Plummer, Linda Purl, Gary Collins and Ben Browder.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Star
programme.desc: A woman dreams of escaping the drudgery of everyday life and becoming a successful singer. A romance with a handsome stranger offers her hope - but the lovebirds are soon separated, and her spirits take another battering. Romantic drama, starring Jennie Garth, Craig Bierko, Terry Farrell and Ted Wass.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The family help their relatives to make a stand against the authorities, following the issuing of an eviction notice.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: After having a domestic squabble, Laura suspects that Almanzo is having an affair with a former girlfriend and decides to leave him and move back to her parents' home.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert begins writing to a pen pal in another city, but cannot understand why she seems so reluctant to meet him.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim faces temptation and Kyle is offered a job in Portland, while Syd misdiagnoses a baby's illness, bringing the full weight of the parents' anger down on her head.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie announces that she's marrying Richie, but Lynda's carping, cynical comments make Syd wonder whether the pair really love each other.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma organises a traditional quilting as Mary Ellen's birthday approaches, but Mary Ellen rejects the custom as demeaning to her.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma rallies the community to save an old house from demolition, unaware that Grandpa has secured the contract to knock it down.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The newspaper where John-Boy works closes down, but the owner offers to sell him a printing press so he can publish one of his own. However, raising the money proves difficult.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is approached by old flame Selena Linville, who wants him to come with her to Spain and report on the Civil War.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: An old man, still grieving over the loss of his wife, is placed in a nursing home. His outlook on life changes when he has the opportunity to fulfil his wife's biggest wish to visit Hollywood.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan reunites two childhood friends, who immediately decide to elope - but their hasty wedding is fraught with difficulties. Helen Hunt guest stars.

programme.title: Riders
programme.desc: Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's racy novel about love, lust and rivalry in the ritzy world of international showjumping. Michael Praed and Marcus Gilbert star as the riders who have been bitter enemies since childhood, and are now competing for women and the chance to become champions of the equestrian world. With Stephanie Beacham, Anthony Valentine and Caroline Harker.

programme.title: Lady Boss
programme.desc: Part one of a two-part adaptation of Jackie Collins' novel, starring Kim Delaney as an ambitious Hollywood studio executive battling to keep control of a movie studio with old enemies threatening to undermine her. With Jack Scalia.

programme.title: Lady Boss
programme.desc: Conclusion of the adaptation of Jackie Collins' novel, starring Kim Delaney as an ambitious Hollywood studio executive battling to keep control of a movie studio with old enemies threatening to undermine her. With Jack Scalia.

programme.title: The Man Who Made Husbands Jealous
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's novel about Lysander Hawkley, a philanderer whose best friend edges him into a new line of work - patching up ailing marriages. Stephen Billington stars, with Kim Criswell and Hugh Bonneville.

programme.title: The Man Who Made Husbands Jealous
programme.desc: Part two of two. Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's novel about Lysander Hawkley, a philanderer whose best friend edges him into a new line of work - patching up ailing marriages. Stephen Billington stars, with Kim Criswell and Hugh Bonneville.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. The family help their relatives to make a stand against the authorities, following the issuing of an eviction notice.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy encounters a variety of new challenges during his first day at Boatwright. Back home, Jason feels the need to be the `oldest' and excel at school like John-Boy.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Almanzo Wilder joins his father-in-law Charles Ingalls in the freight business, but the pair soon argue about the shortest route to the next town.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: To See the Light - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adam's sight is miraculously restored in an accident at the warehouse, but as he begins adjusting to the world all over again, Mary fears they may drift apart.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney and Joanie discover their father has been seeing a mysterious woman, while Robbie falls for a student on the basketball team. With guest star Michelle Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim has hallucinatory conversations with a talking dog, while Sydney goes on a blind date with a wealthy New Age guru and reacts badly to a doctor who stands in the way of a successful career in plastic surgery.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark come to the aid of a scriptwriter, who needs help funding a movie.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help an Asian woman whose family have recently arrived in America to protect them from racial prejudice.(n)

programme.title: Earl Hamner Storyteller
programme.desc: Documentary shedding light on the life and legacy of Earl Hamner, creator of The Waltons and writer for The Twilight Zone.(n)

programme.title: Judith Krantz's Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Part one of three. Drama following the lives and loves of a family shattered by hatred during one of the most turbulent periods in history, the 1930s. Starring Lucy Gutteridge, Courteney Cox and Mia Sara.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy's book is accepted for publishing, ensuring his feelings of inadequacy are completely erased, and upstaging his brother Jason in the process.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim returns home to recover from his injuries, leaving Syd, Joanie and Robbie to clash over each other's reactions to the changes in their father.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Three young sisters and their brother are orphaned in early childhood, and while three of them are found loving and protective homes, one suffers a life of neglect and poverty. Thirty years later they are reunited, but the elder sister has a shocking secret she needs to share. Drama based on a novel by Danielle Steel, starring Jaclyn Smith, Perry King, Colleen Dewhurst and Claudia Christian.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's No Greater Love
programme.desc: A woman endures a seemingly endless series of personal trials and traumas after her parents are killed on the Titanic, but carries on struggling to keep her family together. Period drama, starring Kelly Rutherford, Chris Sarandon, Simon MacCorkindale and Michael Landes.(n)

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alex drops out of college and ends up joining the navy during the Second World War. While he is away at sea, he learns he is a father.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A widowed father is coping badly with his wife's death, but his son is convinced that what he really needs is some new romance in his life. He arranges for his dad to go on a radio phone-in show, and his touching story moves a reporter to respond, even though she is already engaged. She returns to her fiance, but the boy, certain she is the woman for his father, plots to bring them together. Romantic comedy, with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan.(n)

Mystery based on Linda Castillo's novel, starring Neve Campbell and Christian Campbell.(n)

It falls to the indomitable amateur sleuth to unmask the culprit. Drama, with Helen Hayes, Barnard Hughes, Season Hubley and Swoosie Kurtz.

programme.desc: John-Boy takes in a runaway child fleeing from her abusive stepfather. However, Grandpa is suspicious of her story.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia gets a job working for a dressmaker, but as her responsibilities grow, she starts to miss leading a simple life.

programme.title: Montana Sky
programme.desc: Three women with the same father but different mothers meet for the first time after their estranged father dies. They discover he has left them his ranch in his will - on the condition that they run the estate together for at least a year. Unfortunately, they soon learn the old man had enemies determined to make sure they fail. Drama, starring Ashley Williams, Charlotte Ross and Laura Mennell.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Now and Forever
programme.desc: A couple's seemingly perfect marriage is destroyed when the husband is accused of rape by another woman. Drama based on the novel by Danielle Steele, starring Cheryl Ladd and Robert Coleby, with Christine Amor.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Zoya
programme.desc: Part one of two. A Russian aristocrat is forced by the Revolution into a life of poverty-stricken exile in Paris, where she falls for a handsome American soldier. The couple move to New York and seem set for a life of happiness - until the Wall Street Crash deals another devastating blow. Melodrama, based on Danielle Steel's novel, starring Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and Diana Rigg.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Zoya
programme.desc: The Wall Street Crash deals another devastating blow to exiled Russian aristocrat Zoya as she moves to New York with the handsome American soldier she met in Paris. Concluding part of the melodrama based on Danielle Steel's novel, starring Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and Diana Rigg.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Mixed Blessings
programme.desc: Three couples contemplating parenthood each encounter difficulties. Andy and Diana struggle to conceive, forcing them to consider other options, Charlie wants to be a father but his wife Beth is unconvinced, while Brad and his younger spouse Pilar have a difficult relationship with his daughter from a previous marriage. Drama, starring Bruce Greenwood and Gabrielle Carteris.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Secrets
programme.desc: The cast of a glossy American TV series' steamy on-screen relationships pale in comparison with their behind-the-scenes antics. Drama, starring Stephanie Beacham, Christopher Plummer, Linda Purl, Gary Collins and Ben Browder.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Star
programme.desc: A woman dreams of escaping the drudgery of everyday life and becoming a successful singer. A romance with a handsome stranger offers her hope - but the lovebirds are soon separated, and her spirits take another battering. Romantic drama, starring Jennie Garth, Craig Bierko, Terry Farrell and Ted Wass.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The family help their relatives to make a stand against the authorities, following the issuing of an eviction notice.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: After having a domestic squabble, Laura suspects that Almanzo is having an affair with a former girlfriend and decides to leave him and move back to her parents' home.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert begins writing to a pen pal in another city, but cannot understand why she seems so reluctant to meet him.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim faces temptation and Kyle is offered a job in Portland, while Syd misdiagnoses a baby's illness, bringing the full weight of the parents' anger down on her head.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie announces that she's marrying Richie, but Lynda's carping, cynical comments make Syd wonder whether the pair really love each other.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma organises a traditional quilting as Mary Ellen's birthday approaches, but Mary Ellen rejects the custom as demeaning to her.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma rallies the community to save an old house from demolition, unaware that Grandpa has secured the contract to knock it down.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The newspaper where John-Boy works closes down, but the owner offers to sell him a printing press so he can publish one of his own. However, raising the money proves difficult.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is approached by old flame Selena Linville, who wants him to come with her to Spain and report on the Civil War.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: An old man, still grieving over the loss of his wife, is placed in a nursing home. His outlook on life changes when he has the opportunity to fulfil his wife's biggest wish to visit Hollywood.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan reunites two childhood friends, who immediately decide to elope - but their hasty wedding is fraught with difficulties. Helen Hunt guest stars.

programme.title: Riders
programme.desc: Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's racy novel about love, lust and rivalry in the ritzy world of international showjumping. Michael Praed and Marcus Gilbert star as the riders who have been bitter enemies since childhood, and are now competing for women and the chance to become champions of the equestrian world. With Stephanie Beacham, Anthony Valentine and Caroline Harker.

programme.title: Lady Boss
programme.desc: Part one of a two-part adaptation of Jackie Collins' novel, starring Kim Delaney as an ambitious Hollywood studio executive battling to keep control of a movie studio with old enemies threatening to undermine her. With Jack Scalia.

programme.title: Lady Boss
programme.desc: Conclusion of the adaptation of Jackie Collins' novel, starring Kim Delaney as an ambitious Hollywood studio executive battling to keep control of a movie studio with old enemies threatening to undermine her. With Jack Scalia.

programme.title: The Man Who Made Husbands Jealous
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's novel about Lysander Hawkley, a philanderer whose best friend edges him into a new line of work - patching up ailing marriages. Stephen Billington stars, with Kim Criswell and Hugh Bonneville.

programme.title: The Man Who Made Husbands Jealous
programme.desc: Part two of two. Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's novel about Lysander Hawkley, a philanderer whose best friend edges him into a new line of work - patching up ailing marriages. Stephen Billington stars, with Kim Criswell and Hugh Bonneville.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy encounters a variety of new challenges during his first day at Boatwright. Back home, Jason feels the need to be the `oldest' and excel at school like John-Boy.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Almanzo Wilder joins his father-in-law Charles Ingalls in the freight business, but the pair soon argue about the shortest route to the next town.(n)

programme.sub-title: To See the Light - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adam's sight is miraculously restored in an accident at the warehouse, but as he begins adjusting to the world all over again, Mary fears they may drift apart.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney and Joanie discover their father has been seeing a mysterious woman, while Robbie falls for a student on the basketball team. With guest star Michelle Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim has hallucinatory conversations with a talking dog, while Sydney goes on a blind date with a wealthy New Age guru and reacts badly to a doctor who stands in the way of a successful career in plastic surgery.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark come to the aid of a scriptwriter, who needs help funding a movie.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help an Asian woman whose family have recently arrived in America to protect them from racial prejudice.(n)

programme.title: Earl Hamner Storyteller
programme.desc: Documentary shedding light on the life and legacy of Earl Hamner, creator of The Waltons and writer for The Twilight Zone.(n)

programme.title: Judith Krantz's Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Part one of three. Drama following the lives and loves of a family shattered by hatred during one of the most turbulent periods in history, the 1930s. Starring Lucy Gutteridge, Courteney Cox and Mia Sara.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy's book is accepted for publishing, ensuring his feelings of inadequacy are completely erased, and upstaging his brother Jason in the process.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim returns home to recover from his injuries, leaving Syd, Joanie and Robbie to clash over each other's reactions to the changes in their father.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Three young sisters and their brother are orphaned in early childhood, and while three of them are found loving and protective homes, one suffers a life of neglect and poverty. Thirty years later they are reunited, but the elder sister has a shocking secret she needs to share. Drama based on a novel by Danielle Steel, starring Jaclyn Smith, Perry King, Colleen Dewhurst and Claudia Christian.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's No Greater Love
programme.desc: A woman endures a seemingly endless series of personal trials and traumas after her parents are killed on the Titanic, but carries on struggling to keep her family together. Period drama, starring Kelly Rutherford, Chris Sarandon, Simon MacCorkindale and Michael Landes.(n)

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alex drops out of college and ends up joining the navy during the Second World War. While he is away at sea, he learns he is a father.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A widowed father is coping badly with his wife's death, but his son is convinced that what he really needs is some new romance in his life. He arranges for his dad to go on a radio phone-in show, and his touching story moves a reporter to respond, even though she is already engaged. She returns to her fiance, but the boy, certain she is the woman for his father, plots to bring them together. Romantic comedy, with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A widowed father is coping badly with his wife's death, but his son is convinced that what he really needs is some new romance in his life. He arranges for his dad to go on a radio phone-in show, and his touching story moves a reporter to respond, even though she is already engaged. She returns to her fiance, but the boy, certain she is the woman for his father, plots to bring them together. Romantic comedy, with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: I'm Still Laughing
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Bill Bellamy hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's comedy franchise. Featuring comedy veteran Bruce Bruce who teams up with Huggy Lowdown, Aida Rodriguez, and Brian "Da Wildcat" Smith.

programme.title: Ease on Down the Road
programme.desc: Ronnie faces his past crimes. Meanwhile, Brandon's plan to finance his business goes awry. Kevin stars in the school play and attends a cast party with his friends. Emmett decides to fight for full custody. Season finale.(c)

programme.title: Wealth Gap
programme.desc: The President tries to boost public perception of his net worth, while Vice President Mike Pence grapples with Second Lady Karen Pence's newfound interest in material goods.(c)

programme.title: Species Jump
programme.desc: Saul calls an old friend. Wellington has a problem. Carrie enjoys a win.(c)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: Searing account of the Vietnam War's first major battle starring Mel Gibson as Lt. Col. Hal Moore, who refuses to yield to the overwhelming numbers of his determined enemy during a bloody 1965 clash in the Drang Valley. Madeleine Stowe and Barry Pepper costar in this true-life chronicle.

programme.title: The Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner is transformed into a giant super-strong creature and has to fight the forces of evil while fighting the evil within himself. Eric Bana stars with Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly. Directed by Ang Lee.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: A war thriller inspired by actual events details a secret team of American commandos who masqueraded as Nazis in an attempt to steal a decoding machine from a sinking German U-boat but when their plan goes awry, they find themselves stranded on the enemy sub. Features an all-star cast, including Matthew McConaughey, Harvey Keitel and rocker Jon Bon Jovi.

programme.title: Risk Management
programme.desc: Chuck faces scrutiny within his office and from the Attorney General. Axe refortifies Axe Capital, and weighs his options for retaliation. The fund wrestles with a precarious economic landscape that threatens the very existence of Axe Cap. Wendy entertains an offer from a rival hedge fund manager. Lara intervenes in an emergency at her children's school. Season premiere.(c)

programme.title: Dead Cat Bounce
programme.desc: Axe publicly spars with a rival hedge fund manager and with the help of a talented intern initiates a new financial play to hurt the competition. Chuck deploys his team to quickly find a high-profile case that might save his sinking status. Wendy navigates a minefield of questioning that could result in disaster for Chuck.(c)

programme.title: Optimal Play
programme.desc: Axe considers buying an NFL franchise, and finds a new ally. Chuck begins a last ditch case against a banking titan by developing a low-level informant. Meanwhile, Wendy makes a controversial appearance at the Alpha Cup Charity Poker Tournament by accompanying Axe's competitor as his performance coach. Lara launches her new business.(c)

programme.title: The Oath
programme.desc: Under pressure to make progress, Chuck develops a new strategy. Wendy helps a tech billionaire assess a candidate for a special project. Axe considers pledging half his net worth to charity. Lara's new business faces a rival. Meanwhile, Axe and Chuck find themselves together in a room for the first time since their face off.(c)

programme.title: Currency
programme.desc: Chuck, Connerty and Sacker must rely on an anxious insider who's willing to wear a wire. Meanwhile, Axe's numbers take a big hit, leaving him to scout ideas for a quick play with a huge payoff. Wendy rediscovers her passion for her former job at Axe Capital through an old colleague. The reality of Lara's business starts to affect her marriage.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Indian Four
programme.desc: Axe negotiates with a reluctant seller, who is key to the success of Axe’s municipal bond play. Wendy makes a professional decision that adds further conflict to her relationship with Chuck. As attempts to reach a deal with a high profile defendant fail, Chuck’s office faces the uncertainty of jury selection. Tensions between Lara and Axe escalate.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Victory Lap
programme.desc: Axe assembles a war room in the Hamptons following a disastrous setback in Sandicot for Axe Capital. The fate of the town hangs in the balance while Axe seeks counsel on how best to recoup his losses. Chuck capitalizes on a high profile victory, but alienates Wendy in the process, causing the couple to change the status of their separation.(c)

programme.title: The Kingmaker
programme.desc: Axe investigates who was behind the breakdown in his Sandicot dealings but faces formidable opposition. Chuck digs up dirt on a political rival. Lara makes a PR trip to Sandicot to ease tensions between the town and the Axelrods. Wendy helps Taylor solve a problem at Axe Capital. Chuck and Senior curry favor with a powerful ally.(c)

programme.title: Sic Transit Imperium
programme.desc: Axe is offered inside information from a former employee and considers whether to use it. Chuck faces external pressure to drop an ongoing investigation. Lara plans a lavish birthday celebration for Axe only to discover he's lied to her about his relationship with Wendy. Chuck is willing to support Ira and Senior's investment in a company about to go public.(c)

programme.title: With or Without You
programme.desc: Axe deals with a major family disturbance involving Lara and the kids. Chuck considers the potential pitfalls of his personal life while being vetted for political advancement. Wendy tries to right a wrong she committed against Axe. At an impromptu dinner Chuck and Wendy open up to each other.(c)

programme.title: Golden Frog Time
programme.desc: Chuck finds he has much at stake in the success of a new business venture; Senior, too, is heavily invested. Meanwhile, Axe takes out a massive short and takes steps to insure its failure. Wendy wrestles with a familiar and uncomfortable position: caught between Axe and Chuck.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Ball in Hand
programme.desc: Axe receives news from an unexpected source that he's in the crosshairs of law enforcement. While Axe moves quickly to safeguard his livelihood, Chuck arranges the last pieces of his long game in order to secure victory. Lara marshals her resources to protect what’s hers. Wendy and Chuck make a momentous decision about the state of their marriage. Season finale.(c)

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.
