The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) is a champ again. When there is a challenge from a Soviet giant named Drago (Dolph Lundgren), the challenger is laughed off. The Soviet government wants the prestige of a World Heavyweight Boxing Championship and stands fully behind Drago - a cold, blond, almost-bloodless fighting machine who is somewhat inhuman. Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers) is now Rocky's manager and is appalled by the effrontery of the challenge. To teach the upstart a lesson in boxing, Apollo agrees to an exhibition match in Las Vegas.(n)

programme.title: The Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: An ambitious young journalist (Evan Peters) embeds himself with a dangerous band of pirates in Somalia to get an unfiltered investigative perspective, but his inexperience threatens to derail his plans.(n)

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide.(n)

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.(n)

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress.

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat.

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into an abandoned house. It's populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one named Casper, who befriends his lonely daughter named Kat. Bill Pullman and Christina Ricci star.

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town.

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children.

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: Warren Beatty stars as a tough detective with a soft heart and a huge appetite for adventure. He faces the most picturesque gangsters ever to release crime on the streets of his city.

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.

programme.title: Osama
programme.desc: The first major motion picture to emerge from Afghanistan following the fall of the repressive Taliban regime is the story of a young girl (Marina Golbahari) struggling to survive in the early days of the Taliban's patriarchal rule by disguising herself as a boy. Siddiq Barmak's powerful drama won the Golden Globe for Best Foreign Language Film and an honorable mention at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.

programme.title: Time At The Top
programme.desc: 14-year old Susan Shawson travels back in time in her building's elevator. Altered by a retired physicist living in her building, it transports her from Philadelphia in 1998 to the same place in 1881. There she meets Victoria Walker, a girl her own age in need of assistance with her own family problems. Gradually discovering the power of her time machine, Susan, Victoria, and her young brother Robert travel back and forth in time and succeed in changing both the past and the future.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children.

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: Warren Beatty stars as a tough detective with a soft heart and a huge appetite for adventure. He faces the most picturesque gangsters ever to release crime on the streets of his city.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien) is a lonely 11-year-old boy who escapes from his bleak reality by glorying in the action adventure movies of his favorite film character, Jack Slater (Arnold Schwarzenegger). When his best friend, Nick the projectionist, gives him a special ticket to the new Slater film, Danny is magically transported into Jack's world, where the good guys always win. Danny becomes his helper as Jack battles a trio of nefarious bad guys, Benedict (Charles Dance), Vivaldi (Anthony Quinn) and The Ripper (Tom Noonan).

programme.title: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
programme.desc: In an 18th century European city besieged by the Turkish army, an old man appears (John Neville) who claims to be Baron Munchausen. No one believes him except 10-year-old Sally (Sarah Polley), who joins him on a quest to save the city from the Turks. First they must find the Baron's four closest friends, Albrecht (Winston Dennis), the strongest man on Earth, Berthold (Eric Idle), the fastest man alive, Adolphus (Charles McKeown), who has powerful sight and Gustavus (Jack Purvis), who can blow harder than a hurricane. Directed by Terry Gilliam.

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.

programme.title: Time At The Top
programme.desc: 14-year old Susan Shawson travels back in time in her building's elevator. Altered by a retired physicist living in her building, it transports her from Philadelphia in 1998 to the same place in 1881. There she meets Victoria Walker, a girl her own age in need of assistance with her own family problems. Gradually discovering the power of her time machine, Susan, Victoria, and her young brother Robert travel back and forth in time and succeed in changing both the past and the future.

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder.

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct.(n)

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves stars in this sports comedy as a Chicago gambler who gets some help with his massive debts in exchange for coaching an underprivileged Little League team. At first he only takes the job out of obligation, but his team's heart and their attractive teacher Miss Wilkes (Diane Lane) soon have him angling for a championship. D.B. Sweeney costars.(n)

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama.(n)

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs.(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.(n)

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration.(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World...
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments.(n)

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: Kurt Russell plays determined United States ice hockey coach Herb Brooks, who has the impossible dream of beating the seemingly unbeatable Soviet Union the 1980 Winter Olympics. Starting with a handpicked group of 26 undisciplined kids, Brooks coaches them to play like they've never played before, and turns 20 of them into a team that believes they could achieve the unachievable. Based on the true story.(n)

programme.title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
programme.desc: A ten-year-old genius inventor must rally his neighborhood pals to build an armada of spaceships and rescue their parents from a goopy alien race in time for dinner in this computer-animated box office blockbuster from Nickelodeon. Featuring the voices of Martin Short, Andrea Martin and Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").

programme.title: Messy
programme.desc: The victim is rushed to the hospital after being shot as the family follows close behind. The family grapples with the tragedy and hypothesizes on the shooter's identity.

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: A Beam Of Sunshine
programme.desc: Nancy (MARY-LOUISE PARKER) recovers from her bullet shot wound and makes a few friends and enemies during her stay in the hospital. Back at the house, Andy (JUSTIN KIRK) and Jill (JENNIFER JASON LEIGH) are romantically interrupted by Jill's husband. Silas (HUNTER PARRISH) maintains an unconventional affair with Kiku (KAT FOSTER), while Shane makes new friends at the Police Academy. Meanwhile, Doug (KEVIN NEALON) and Whit (BRUCE NOZICK) are pitched new business ideas.

programme.title: Crossing Over
programme.desc: The politically charged subject of illegal immigration forms the basis of this drama starring Harrison Ford as a morally conflicted border official in love with a Mexican woman about to be deported, whose job connects him to several other aspiring citizens struggling to make their way in the U.S. Ray Liotta and Ashley Judd costar.

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: At the dawn of the Civil War, the men of Cold Mountain, North Carolina, rush to join the Confederate army. Ada (Nicole Kidman) has vowed to wait for Inman (Jude Law), but as the war drags on and letters go unanswered, she must find the will to survive while desperately struggling to hold onto her family's farm. Inman's long journey home takes him through the crumbling confederacy, as he meets people of all walks of life who both aid and hinder his mission.

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy.

programme.title: Claire in Motion
programme.desc: Three weeks after Claire's husband mysteriously disappears, the police end their investigation. Claire doesn't give up, and soon discovers his troubling secrets, including a graduate student with whom he had formed a close bond. As she digs deeper, Claire begins to lose her grip on how well she truly knew her husband and questions her own identity in the process.

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as Rob Gordon, the owner of a failing record store located on one of the back streets of Chicago. He employs two wacky clerks, the rock snob Barry (Jack Black) and the underachiever Dick (Todd Luiso). Rob's business isn't the only thing in his life that's floundering however, after after his longtime girlfriend Laura (Iben Hjejle) walks out on him. This forces him to examine his past failed attempts at romance.

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as Rob Gordon, the owner of a failing record store located on one of the back streets of Chicago. He employs two wacky clerks, the rock snob Barry (Jack Black) and the underachiever Dick (Todd Luiso). Rob's business isn't the only thing in his life that's floundering however, after after his longtime girlfriend Laura (Iben Hjejle) walks out on him. This forces him to examine his past failed attempts at romance.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought.

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers).

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.

programme.title: Despite the Falling Snow
programme.desc: In 1950s Moscow, communist Katya secretly spies for the Americans in the Cold War arms race. When she lands her biggest assignment, stealing secrets from rising government star Alexander, the last thing she expects is to fall in love with him. Reconciling her passion for him with her beliefs about communism means making the greatest sacrifice, a sacrifice that Alexander only uncovers thirty years later.

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life.

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar.

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: Warren Beatty stars as a tough detective with a soft heart and a huge appetite for adventure. He faces the most picturesque gangsters ever to release crime on the streets of his city.

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar.(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").(n)

programme.title: My First Mister
programme.desc: Jennifer (Leelee Sobieski) is a 17-year-old Goth with multiple face-piercings and a fondness for graveyards. Randall (Albert Brooks) is a middle-aged salesman with an obsessively tidy life and a fear of anything new. Desperate to escape her world, Jennifer impulsively applies for a job at Randall's conservative clothing store. Soon, an unlikely friendship blooms. But even as Randall attempts to show Jennifer the possibilities of her own future, Jennifer discovers the extraordinary secret haunting Randall's past.(n)

programme.title: Body of Deceit
programme.desc: Alice (Kristanna Loken) is a ghostwriter for a famous author. She is halfway through the work of his new book, but cannot write anymore. A year has passed since she had a terrible accident in Malta where she was staying with her husband Max (Antonio Cupo) in his family villa and was in a coma for two weeks. Since then, she has been suffering from depression and has recurrent and cryptic nightmares. Max persuades her to go back to Malta in the hopes that something will unblock her mind so she can start working again and meet her deadline.(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story.(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley.(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.(n)

programme.title: #ThatsHarassment
programme.desc: This film is a series of six short films, written and directed by Sigal Avin. It depicts six different cases of sexual harassment in the work place, all based on real events. In ‘The Boss,’ a young employee gets a ride home. In ‘The Photographer,’ a young model is put in an uncomfortable position. In ‘The Doctor,’ a patient is taken advantage of. In ‘The Actor,’ a costume dresser is taken aback. In ‘The Politician,’ a journalist is asked to take a break from an interview. In ‘The Co-worker,’ a bartender trains the new girl.(n)

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency.(n)

programme.title: The Rendezvous
programme.desc: Rachel, a Jewish-American doctor and Jake, an Arab-American government bureaucrat, are trying to solve the mysterious death of Rachel's brother. Racing around the world, they find themselves hunted by a doomsday group. The group believes Rachel and Jake possess an ancient script discovered by Rachel's brother that could bring about the end of days. Caught in the middle of a plot to hasten the end of mankind, Rachel and Jake must solve a murder and save the world.(n)

programme.title: Punch-Drunk Love

programme.title: Cold Mountain

Ada (Nicole Kidman) has vowed to wait for Inman (Jude Law), but as the war drags on and letters go unanswered, she must find the will to survive while desperately struggling to hold onto her family's farm. Inman's long journey home takes him through the crumbling confederacy, as he meets people of all walks of life who both aid and hinder his mission.(n)

Michael Pena and Derek Luke costar with Andrew Garfield in this topical, provocative drama, directed by Redford.(n)

programme.desc: Playboy man-child Arthur learns that his wealthy mother will only give him his inheritance if he agrees to marry the daughter of a millionaire. However, Arthur hates his intended bride and instead falls for an unlicensed tour guide. (cc).

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: A self-centered ad exec (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to read women's minds---much to his chagrin. Clever premise, but the one-note joke wears thin. Helen Hunt. Directed by Nancy Meyers ("Something's Gotta Give"). Bette Midler has a cameo. (cc).

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services. (cc).

programme.title: Independence Day Resurgence
programme.desc: The nations of Earth band together to fight off a second alien invasion, 20 years after the first attack brought humanity to the brink of extinction. Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the alliance readies itself for a massive war. (cc).

programme.title: U.S. Marshals
programme.desc: Sam Gerard is back chasing another wrongly accused fugitive. This time he's pursuing Mark Sheridan, a Chicago man framed for a double homicide in New York. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: Action flick about an emergency chief and a geologist who scramble to halt the destruction of L.A. from a volcanic eruption. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: A hugely successful businesswoman is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she tries to earn redemption and revamp her public image by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: An African-American widower asks his family to join him for their first Christmas since his wife passed away. However, having all of them under one roof leads to a number of personal confrontations as secrets are revealed and marriages are tested. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five high-school students from different cliques spend a day-long detention together, and discover that they have more in common then they ever expected. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, a bumbling private eye and an enforcer-for-hire team up to find a missing woman with ties to the porn industry. In time, their sleuthing reveals a far-reaching conspiracy involving corruption in the federal government. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: Sadistic ex-con Max Cady seeks revenge on the defense attorney who acted unethically in order to ensure he went to jail. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Human Stain
programme.desc: Well-acted but superficial adaptation of Philip Roth's novel about a light-skinned black college professor (Anthony Hopkins) who has been passing as white. Nicole Kidman, Ed Harris, Gary Sinise. Robert Benton directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two young boys execute the "perfect" murder, even pinning it on a local crook, but a detective with a disturbed past will not be outsmarted. The boys lie about knowing each other and cover their tracks, but a lack of trust could bring them down. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: Adaptation of the graphic novel set in 1985 America, where a cadre of forced-into-retirement superheroes investigate the murder of one of their own and uncover a wide-ranging conspiracy. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: A loose remake of the 1963 film "Charade," this romantic thriller focuses on a mysterious American who aids a Parisian who is menaced by crooks after her husband is killed. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: Five Oscars, including Best Picture, went to this epic drama about a Roman general who winds up an enslaved gladiator when he refuses to pledge loyalty to the emperor's power-hungry son. programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Jazdy Gwiazdy
programme.desc: Gospodarz programu Filip "Rudy" Rudanacja zaprasza do swojego garbusa znane i lubiane gwiazdy show-biznesu. Podczas wspólnej przejażdżki nie zawaha się zapytać swojego gościa o wszystko, na co ma ochotę i co chcieliby usłyszeć widzowie.

programme.title: Przesłuchanie
programme.desc: W każdym odcinku przesłuchiwana jest jedna z gwiazd show-biznesu. Twórcy programu zadają jej niewygodne pytania.

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2
programme.desc: Twórcy programu w każdym wydaniu prezentują 10 wybranych hitów. Utwory, będące największymi przebojami najsłynniejszych wykonawców, grane są jeden po drugim.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.

programme.sub-title: Raiders of the Lost Nomicon/Rise of the Planet of the Robo-Apes

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. When a big-time Hollywood publicist discovers Spencer and vows to make him famous, Billy become insanely jealous. Then, when Billy discovers that sports stars have become even more famous than pop stars, he decides to inhabit Kleet's body and become a soccer star.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.sub-title: Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy/And the Winner Is
programme.desc: Double bill. Billy creates a bunch of clones of himself, but one of the bands is a recipe for disaster. Then, Spencer has detention while the others go to an awards ceremony, and is determined to sneak out and join them.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Down the Drain/9 to 5 to Oblivion
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop helps Dennis search for a mysterious croc-baby that has been seen prowling the sewers, but Kat may have something to do with the strange creature. Later, he is forced to work in Henry's shop to pay off his debts after breaking every window in Dennis's house by loading the T-shirt cannon with heavy objects.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Coop uses Kat's time machine to make sure Millie never finds the evil genius in the first place, but he ends up altering the future for the worse by bringing on an invasion. Later, Coop tries to undo it, and joins a brave band of Kat Fighters led by Millie.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. When Randy runs out of smoke bombs, he must find a sacred tree whose sap is the key to making more. However, the problems is that it is McFist's Christmas tree.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. When a frozen student from the 1980s is thawed and stanked, Randy and Howard must reunite him with his lost love before the school is destroyed. Then, Randy accidently causes the captain of the Wave Slayer team to get stanked, towel boy/waxers Randy and Howard must step up to save the big race.

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Shelby is sad his favourite TV show has finished, so Boyster makes him a super aerial so that he can watch TV programmes from around the world but it interferes with Boyster's sonar. Then, a spider bites Boyster on the hand, immediately making it sticky.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The duo play in an exhibition hockey game and take it to the extreme in a display involving incredible ice ramps, puck pushing prowess and snow-soldier savagery.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace makes Buford guard Phineas and Ferb's latest invention, and the boys create a machine that will revolutionise dental hygiene.

programme.title: Hulk and the Agents of Smash
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Agents of Smash and the Avengers must work together to free Hulk from the Supreme Intelligence and prevent the destruction of Earth.

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: Captain America's team are involved in a dangerous situation involving the Crimson Dynamo and The Winter Guard.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: The Guardians and the Avengers team-up to find out what powerful secrets lie inside Thanos' asteroid.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace keeps an eye on the boys when she is convinced they are creating a bigger ride, and later, they decide to build a restaurant and name it Chez Platypus.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Success/Doof Side of the Moon
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace goes away to a retreat, and the duo take advantage of her absence to build an all-terrain vehicle. The boys then try to secure a new attraction for Danville, and Doof decides to rotate the moon.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: When Rocket and Drax wake up with absolutely no memory of the night before, it is left to the Guardians to piece together their adventures.

programme.title: Marvel's Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: The Rise of Doc Ock - Part Three
programme.desc: Part three of four. Peter spends a day at Oz Academy in the hopes of finding a clue that will convince Harry that his Dad is out to destroy Spider-Man.

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: The Avengers are challenged by the fully formed and incredibly powerful Squadron Supreme for a battle that will end with only one team as the victor.

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: Unknown to the Squadron Supreme and the rest of the world, the Avengers are hiding and working on a plan to save the planet and stop the Squadron Supreme once and for all.

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels
programme.desc: Ezra calls in every favour he can in a bid to rally together a ragtag group for a seemingly impossible fight against Governor Pryce and her Imperial forces.

programme.title: DuckTales
programme.desc: Huey and Webby's argument over the existence of the mythic Terra-firmians leads them to explore an abandoned subway tunnel.

programme.title: Big Hero 6: The Series
programme.desc: When Aunt Cass stumbles into an underground cooking competition, she thrives and becomes addicted to the excitement.

programme.title: Lab Rats Elite Force
programme.desc: Kaz, Oliver and Skylar join forces with Bree and Chase to form a powerful elite force that combines bionic heroes and superheroes and vow to defend the world against its villains.

programme.title: Lab Rats Elite Force
programme.desc: When Kaz outshines Oliver during superhero training, Oliver resolves to master his new powers. Meanwhile, Bree and Skylar adjust to sisterhood.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: The Belly of the Beast/Moon Farm
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys make a model shark, which Candace and a sea captain try to capture, and take a cow to the moon to see if milk produced in low gravity makes better ice-cream.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys dress up as ninjas when their mother asks them to be quiet. Buford joins up with Doof, which makes life difficult for Perry.

programme.title: Lab Rats Elite Force
programme.desc: Tasha introduces baby Maya to the team and Bree learns what it takes to be a babysitter, while Chase obsessively designs a device that reverses the aging process.

programme.title: Lab Rats Elite Force
programme.desc: Bree is disappointed by the Elite Force Breakdown, a list ranking the team's members in order of importance. The all-powerful Arcturion space rock from Mighty Med resurfaces.

programme.title: Marvel's Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: The Rise of Dock Ock - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of three. Having convinced Otto Octavius to become the hero known as The Octopus, Spidey invites him to patrol the streets alongside Kid Arachnid and himself until it becomes clear Otto isn't a team player.

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
